Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Sight-seeing \Sight"-see`ing\, a. Engaged in, or given to, seeing sights; eager for novelties or curiosities. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Sight-seeing \Sight"-see`ing\, n. The act of seeing sights; eagerness for novelties or curiosities. [1913 Webster]
sightseeing n : going about to look at places of interest [syn: {rubber-necking}]
